product_overview: Business Management Suite is a comprehensive web application built with React and TypeScript, designed to streamline business operations including sales, purchases, inventory, customer relationships, and financial reporting. It provides users with authentication, real-time analytics dashboards, and extensive administrative controls.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication and session management.
Provide intuitive dashboard visualization of key business metrics.
Facilitate complete inventory and product lifecycle management.
Support customer relationship management with detailed views.
Manage sales and purchase transactions including invoice and quotation generation.
Track business expenses and categorize them for financial oversight.
Allow administrative control over user roles and permissions.
Generate detailed reports covering sales, stock levels, and revenue analytics.
key_features: Authentication system with login and session management.
Dashboard displaying analytics with interactive charts and metrics.
Product module for CRUD operations and inventory management.
Customer relationship management with detailed customer information.
Sales module for creating and managing invoices and quotations.
Purchases module handling purchase invoices and supplier information.
Expense tracking with categorization and history.
Administrative interface for managing users and roles.
Reporting tools providing detailed sales, stock, and revenue reports.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via authentication page and established session.
Upon login, user accesses the dashboard overview with key metrics.
User navigates to product section to manage inventory items (add, edit, delete).
User accesses customer section to view and manage customer details.
User creates and manages sales invoices and quotations through sales pages.
User manages purchase invoices and supplier data in purchases section.
User tracks and categorizes expenses through the expenses module.
Administrators manage user accounts and role assignments via admin pages.
User generates and views various business reports from reporting pages.
validation_criteria: Users must be able to successfully authenticate and maintain session.
Dashboard should display accurate and updated analytics with charts.
Product CRUD operations must function correctly and reflect instantly.
Customer data management must allow creating, editing, and viewing details.
Sales and purchase modules must support invoice and quotation creation and management without errors.
Expense tracking must correctly log and categorize expenses.
Admin user and role management must enforce proper access and permissions.
Reports must accurately reflect the underlying sales, stock, and revenue data and update dynamically.
